Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Removes the requirement that rent arrears be repaid for social services districts located in a municipality with a population of five million or more
Summary: Removes the requirement that rent arrears be repaid for social services districts located in a municipality with a population of five million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to removing the requirement that rent arrears be repaid for social services districts located in a municipality with a population of five million or more
